name: places/ChIJgxUF-d1ZwokR8zu33xJ6CO8
formattedAddress: 37-39 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 37-39 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: Delicious pizza, reasonable prices, and quick service. The plain slice is thin and crispy with a well-balance between the cheese and sauce. Highly recommend stopping by and trying the plain slice. Cash and credit are both accepted. ATM is available. Metered street parking, but it is a busy area and difficult to find parking. 12/2023

text.text: Delicious pizza, reasonable prices, and quick service. The plain slice is thin and crispy with a well-balance between the cheese and sauce. Highly recommend stopping by and trying the plain slice. Cash and credit are both accepted. ATM is available. Metered street parking, but it is a busy area and difficult to find parking. 12/2023

originalText.text:
I ordered delivery, the square chicken parmesan pizza and chicken parmesan calzones.  The square pizza was absolutely delish, tasted fresh, was a perfect temputure with a nice crunchy crust. I highly recommend. I only take away one star from total review because the calzones were a bit toasty almost burnt in some areas. I can only guess that maybe the calzones were baked too close to the sides of the oven or left in there too long? Oh yes and I also ordered garlic knots.  The garlic knots were soo good, fresh minced garlic, delicious. The order came in less than one hour on a Saturday night which is amazing.

I would love to visit in person to rate the atmosphere, etc and to give the calzones another try. I plan to update this review once I go in person.

originalText.text: The only vegan pizza my son will eat is offered here. Love this place so much. I only wish there was an option to order online a vegan cheese pizza, but this is close enough to pick up luckily.  Great customer service also as I was paranoid of the vegan cheese actually being vegan. It tastes so good that it worries me,actually.  Highly recommend and a big thank you to the boss man of this place.

originalText.text: $2 Dollars for a slice. At that price point this is an excellent slice. The crust is chewy and the pizza is oily. I was impressed with the overall flavor and freshness. Will absolutely come back. They were open relatively late during covid which was nice. Outdoor seating made the experience even better!

text.text: $2 Dollars for a slice. At that price point this is an excellent slice. The crust is chewy and the pizza is oily. I was impressed with the overall flavor and freshness. Will absolutely come back. They were open relatively late during covid which was nice. Outdoor seating made the experience even better!

originalText.text:
I've ordered delivery twice from square pizza NYC, the first time was good, the second time was probably the worse pizza I've had in 15 years, and the first pizza where I couldn't even finish a slice.

Pizza arrived cold, it was half cheese half pepperoni and the pepperoni side was covered with pepperoni's stacked on top of each other.  The pizza was so greasy, and had clearly sat so long that some of the grease had congealed on the pizza, and had turned the overall texture of the pizza into mush

The pizza arrived after about 45 minutes, but I'm pretty sure this was an old cheese pizza they cooked a few hours earlier, then threw a pile of pepperoni's on one half of it, and then sent off to be delivered, because the pepperoni's were just piled on one side of the pizza and it didn't look like they were cooked with it
